text: This is a list of the main towns and cities in Turkmenistan. Some might be listed by older, Soviet-era names and spellings. * Abadan * Akdepe * Aşgabat - Capital state * Baýramaly * Bäherden * Bekibent * Bokurdak * Bygdaili * Burdalyk * Çarşaňňy * Çagyl * Çeşme * Darganata * Daşoguz * Davaly * Deverze * Djachev * Ekezhe * Ýolöten * Ýerbent * Esenguly * Garryqala * Gazandzhyk * Gumdag * Gyshgy * Gyzyletrek * Jasga * Kaka * Karabogazkel * Keneurgench * Kerki * Kunya Urgench * Lekker * Mary * Balkanabat * Ogryda * Repatek * Saragt * Serdar (Gyzylarbat) * Shasenem * Tagtabazar * Tejen * Turkmenabat (formerly Chardzhev) * Turkmenbashi (formerly Krasnovodsk) * Uchadzhy Turkmenistan * Turkmenistan
title: List of cities in Turkmenistan
